titles.title: To extend the suspension of duty on 1-(3H)-Isobenzofuranone, 3,3-bis(2-methyl-1-octyl-1H-indol-3-yl)-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/11/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on 1-(3H)-Isobenzofuranone, 3,3-bis(2-methyl-1-octyl-1H-indol-3-yl)-.
